title: Bug 2120MRU File List is not persisted between sessions (1GE71Z0)
OB: The Most Recently Used (MRU) File List is not persisted between sessions of the workbench.
EB: The MRU File List should be persisted between sessions of the workbench, so that the previously opened files are listed when the workbench is restarted.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Start the workbench. 2. Open 2 or 3 files. 3. Shutdown the workbench. 4. Restart the workbench.
